page.title: 10Law & Order
page.content: The Police Force is a self governing body paid for from the County Rate. We have no resident Police Officer but are served by full time police at the part time Police Station at Edenbridge 6 miles away which, when not manned, is connected by direct telephone to Sevenoaks Police Station 11 miles away. A Police car patrols the area once every day &, depending on duties, a second patrol is frequently made. There is little crime in the area, what there is comes under the folowing four headings, house burglary, vandalism, sheep worrying by uncontrolled dogs & road traffic accidents which are chiefly civil offences but may come to the criminal court.
